verbs.description: [ARG0: The intense fear and loathing] [R-ARG0: that] [V: permeates] [ARG1: news coverage of President Donald Trump] is being multiplied on television dramas . Impeachment scenarios and 25th Amendment removal strategies are rolling around in the brains of script - writers .
